text: Babson Ledge is a small barren rock within the edge of the Western Harbor and Gloucester Harbor in Gloucester, Massachusetts. The rock is situated south of the Fort Point, Pavilion Beach, Blynman Canal, Route 127, and west of Rocky Neck. Category:Islands of Massachusetts Category:Islands of Essex County, Massachusetts Category:Gloucester, Massachusetts Category:Coastal islands of Massachusetts
title: Babson Ledge
